11083 lúpyatē. 3. lupta -- , Pk. l(h)ikkaï: likkī roṇū ʻ to be hid ʼ, likāṇū (phonet. l+k -- ) ʻ to conceal ʼ.

11083 lúpyatē ʻ is lost, is removed ʼ TS. (apalupyátē ʻ perishes ʼ AV., lupyamāna -- ʻ bewildered ʼ MaitrUp.). 2. lumpáti ʻ destroys ʼ Hariv., ʻ steals ʼ BhP., ʻ elides ʼ RVPrāt. 3. lupta -- ʻ robbed of, lacking, lost, destroyed ʼ MBh. 4. lōpayati ʻ neglects, infringes ʼ MBh., ʻ eliminates ʼ R. 5. *lōpyate ʻ disappears ʼ (cf. lṓpya -- ʻ concealed ʼ VS.com. [√lup]
G. lapvũ, lapāvũ ʻ to be hidden, hide oneself ʼ. --
M. lipṇẽ intr. ʻ to hide ʼ with -- i -- after likṇẽ see 3.
